title: Quasi-arithmetic mean
summary: In mathematics and statistics, the quasi-arithmetic mean or generalised f-mean or Kolmogorov-Nagumo-de Finetti mean[1] is one generalisation of the more familiar means such as the arithmetic mean and the geometric mean, using a function f {\displaystyle f} . It is also called Kolmogorov mean after Soviet mathematician Andrey Kolmogorov. It is a broader generalization than the regular generalized mean.
